title: Cauldron "Multi Pack" Assortment Black Plastic (4/Pkg) Pkg/1
features: PMU Halloween Cauldron (1) 16 Inch, (1) 12 Inch, (1) 8 Inch and (1) 6 Inch Multi-Pack Assortment Black Plastic Party Accessory.
description: A Black Cauldron for All Occasions! The black cauldron set is the perfect Halloween party decoration. Whether as a table centerpiece overflowing with treats, or a party favor give a way for the kids, these witch's cauldron buckets are a great addition to your event. Three cauldron set. Large cauldron is 12" wide and 9 1/4" deep. Medium cauldron is 9 3/4" wide and 7 3/4" deep. Small cauldron is 7 1/4" wide and 6 1/4" deep. Made of plastic. Small hole in bottom of plastic cauldron's are not made to hold liquid. Ideal for any Halloween or St. Patrick's Day party or event. For extra fun fill your pails with Halloween favors from our Halloween Prize Collection. A simple pot of gold party supply that your guests will notice and admire. Part of Supplies > Baskets
details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item Weight": "4 Pounds", "Date First Available": "August 20, 2008", "Manufacturer": "Century Novelty"}
